function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of COVID-19 patient data from different healthcare centers","Impact":"Potential breach of patient privacy and confidentiality","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption and access controls, and comply with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare centers, application developers"},{"Description":"Making COVID-19 patient data available to the public","Impact":"Risk of spreading misinformation and causing panic","Mitigation":"Implement a review process by medical experts before making data public, and provide clear disclaimers about the limitations of the data","Technologies":"Review systems, expert validation algorithms","People":"Public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Application developers, medical experts"},{"Description":"Live video conferencing for healthcare professionals and patients","Impact":"Risk of security breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive medical conversations","Mitigation":"Implement end-to-end encryption for video conferencing, regular security updates, and strong authentication protocols","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, security patches, strong authentication systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Application developers, healthcare organizations"}]}
